name: places/ChIJWTo0wwFZwokR_ap6N71FLEI
formattedAddress: 30 Central Park S #5D, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 Central Park S #5D, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: This practice has completely turned the tables on me-  over the years I have become accustomed to being made to wait in waiting rooms until the doctor (or hygienist) is ready for me- typically 20 minutes+ after the scheduled appointment. And so, when I show up to this office 4 or 5 minutes late and THEY are waiting for ME, I scratch my head and wonder what they're doing so right (after getting over my embarrassment).  This office seems to run like clockwork. It is clearly well managed and the staff are extremely pleasant and accommodating. The office is modern, immaculate and by the time I am seated in the reclining chair they have already put on music that they know I will like (based on a questionnaire I filled out when I first started with them).  The hygienist is careful, delicate and thorough. Dr. Ahmed is a gem- skilled, knowledgeable, sensitive,  good natured and fun. I highly recommend this practice.

originalText.text:
I only have amazing things to say about Dr. Ahmed! She is a remarkable doctor that genuinely cares about her patients, which is not easy to find. I have had several treatments done by her, and even the more complicated ones have been great experiences. One of them was a root canal on a tooth that had previously been damaged by orthodontic treatment when I was younger and I was very self-conscious about it because it had a grayish color. Dr. Ahmed did a root canal that went on smoothly, then she did an internal whitening on the same tooth, and finally a full mouth whitening. It was such a great decision to get this treatment done. I love my smile even more now!
I recommend Dr. Ahmed to everyone that I can. The dental care that she offers is exceptional and the overall experience of going to Pure Dental Care is of the highest quality!

originalText.text:
I've been going to Dr. Ahmed for several years now and I couldn't be happier with the care I've received. From the moment I walk in, the staff is always friendly and welcoming, and the office is clean and comfortable.

Dr. Ahmed and her team are true professionals who takes the time to explain every procedure and answer any questions I might have. I've never felt rushed and I always leave feeling like I've received the best care possible.

Over the years, I've had everything from routine cleanings to more complex dental work done, and I've always been impressed with the quality of the work. I would highly recommend Dr. Ahmed to anyone looking for a dentist who truly cares about their patients.

originalText.text:
Dr Ahmed is a talented and truly caring and kind dentist, extremely professional, a top notch choice! She has the best updated imaging technology & tools as well as a comfortable treatment areas. Her staff is as warm and thoughtful as she is.
When I recently had a problem with a tooth, she took time out of her personal life to call and to check on me, advise me, prescribed proper medicine/antibiotics to address the issue and was warm and caring as she followed up days later. I am grateful for the fantastic and thorough dental care she has given me for several years now and I recommend her highly.

originalText.text: Doctor Ahmed is wonderful - very competent, professional and friendly- she explained everything in detail and recommended a helpful treatment plan. I went to her for my cleaning and several fillings. Her staff very kind as well and her office is brand new- all modern and appealing. I am looking forward to being her regular patient now. Thank you Pure Dental Care
